verses.verse: Prayse the Lorde. Blessed is the man that feareth the Lord, he hath great delyte in hys commaundmentes.
His sede shall be myghtye vpon earth: the generacyon of the faytfull shalbe blessed:
Ryches and plenteousnesse shalbe in hys house, and his ryghteousnes endureth for euer.
Unto the godly there aryseth vp lyght in the darcknesse he is mercyfull, louyng and ryghteous.
A good man is mercyfull, and lendeth: and wyll gyde his wordes wt discrecion.
For he shall neuer be moued: and the ryghteous shall be had in an euerlasting remembraunce.
He will not be afrayed for eny euell tydinges, for his hert standeth fast, and beleueth in in the Lord.
His hert is stablished: & will not shryncke, vntill he se his desyre vpon his enemyes.
He hath sparsed abroad, and geuen to the poore: and his ryghteousnes remayneth for euer, hys horne shalbe exalted wyth honoure.
The vngodly shall se it, and it shall greue him: he shall gnash with his teeth, & consume awaye: the desyre of the vngodly shall perysh.
